analysis.key_quote: This would degrade the quality of the engineering and computing oriented civil service as those willing to work in this sort of partisan environment will be a subset of the already too small pool of civilians willing to work for the federal government.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the reclassification of civil servants, highlighting concerns about politicization, the degradation of merit-based hiring, and the negative impact on the quality of civil service, particularly in specialized fields.
